name: Unsupervised Domain Adaptation of a Pretrained Cross-Lingual Language Model
description: This demo is an implementation of Unsupervised Domain Adaptation of a Pretrained Cross-Lingual Language Model paper.

paper.text: Li, J., He, R., Ye, H., Ng, H. T., Bing, L., & Yan, R. (2020). Unsupervised domain adaptation of a pretrained cross-lingual language model. Proceedings of the Twenty-Ninth International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence, Nov, 2020 (pp. 3672-3678).

trainingDataset.text: Dataset can be downloaded from author's github repository.

evaluationDataset.text: Dataset can be downloaded from author's github repository.

evaluationScores: 87.85% Avg Acc (German), 87.45% Avg Acc (French), 83.725% Avg Acc (Japanese) on development set, 84.00% Avg Acc (German), 88.40% Avg Acc (French), 85.00% Avg Acc (Japanese) reported by authors in paper on development set.
trainingTime: ~3 hours for 30 epochs for unsupervised training and 60 epochs for supervised training on a single V100 GPU.
modelOutput: Array of logits with the size of number of classes.
modelSize: XLM-Roberta: ~2.2GB, Adaptor Domain: ~8.0MB, Adaptor Global: ~8.0MB, Feature Mapper: ~8.0MB, Classifier: ~9.1KB.
inferenceInfo: ~2 sec on Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz.
usageScenarios: Sentiment analysis for eCommerce with operations across multiple countries.
